message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I think a starting price of $10,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $10,000 on it. Would you consider lowering the price to $9,500?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to my original price.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $9,750?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on $9,500 for the product?
